/* collab.report.getUserTaskDayListCnt */
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) CNT FROM (SELECT ct.TaskSeq , ct.TaskName , ct.TaskStatus , ct.ProgRate , ct.Remark , (SELECT count(*) FROM collab_task_map WHERE TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq) as PrjCount FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task ct INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_task_member ctmember on ctmember.UserCode = #{USERID} and ctmember.TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_report_day rd on rd.ReporterCode =ctmember.UserCode and rd.ReportDate = #{reportDate} and ct.TaskSeq = rd.taskSeq WHERE rd.taskSeq is null AND ct.ParentKey = 0 AND (ct.TaskStatus != 'C' OR (#{reportDate} <= ct.CloseDate and ct.TaskStatus = 'C')) ) a WHERE PrjCount> 0

/* collab.report.getUserCollabReportDayList */ SELECT crd.DaySeq , crd.TaskSeq , ct.TaskName , crd.TaskStatus , crd.ProgRate , crd.TaskTime , crd.Remark , (select count(*) from covi_smart4j.collab_task_map where TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq) as PrjCount , (SELECT concat(m.prjType,'^',case when m.prjType='P' then cp.PrjName else Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, sg.MultiDisplayName) end ,'^', TaskSeq ,'^', SectionName) FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task_map m JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_section s on m.sectionSeq = s.sectionseq LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_project cp on m.PrjType = 'P' and cp.PrjSeq = m.PrjSeq LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group sg on m.PrjType != 'P' and sg.GroupID = m.PrjSeq WHERE TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq order by cp.PrjSeq DESC LIMIT 1 ) as PrjDesc FROM covi_smart4j.collab_report_day crd INNER JOIN collab_task ct on ct.TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq WHERE crd.ReporterCode = #{USERID} AND crd.ReportDate = #{reportDate} order by PrjDesc, crd.TaskSeq
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}

/* collab.report.getUserCollabReportDay */ SELECT crd.DaySeq , date_format(crd.ReportDate, '%Y.%m.%d') as 'ReportDate' , crd.TaskSeq , ct.TaskName , crd.TaskStatus , crd.ProgRate , crd.TaskTime , crd.Remark , (select count(*) from covi_smart4j.collab_task_map where TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq) as PrjCount , (SELECT concat(m.prjType,'^',case when m.prjType='P' then cp.PrjName else Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, sg.MultiDisplayName) end ,'^', TaskSeq ,'^', SectionName) FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task_map m JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_section s on m.sectionSeq = s.sectionseq LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_project cp on m.PrjType = 'P' and cp.PrjSeq = m.PrjSeq LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group sg on m.PrjType != 'P' and sg.GroupID = m.PrjSeq WHERE TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq order by cp.PrjSeq DESC LIMIT 1 ) as PrjDesc FROM covi_smart4j.collab_report_day crd INNER JOIN collab_task ct on ct.TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq WHERE 1 = 1 AND crd.DaySeq = #{daySeq}

mapper.select: /* collab.report.getUserCollabReportWeekProjectList */ SELECT DISTINCT ctmap.PrjSeq as "PrjSeq" , ctmap.PrjType as "PrjType" , cp.PrjName as "PrjName" FROM COVI_SMART4J.COLLAB_REPORT_DAY crd INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.COLLAB_TASK ct on ct.TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.COLLAB_TASK_MAP ctmap on ctmap.TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_project cp on ctmap.PrjType = 'P' and cp.PrjSeq = ctmap.PrjSeq WHERE crd.ReporterCode = #{USERID} and crd.ReportDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and ctmap.PrjType is not null UNION ALL SELECT b.GROUPID AS "PrjSeq" ,CONCAT('T',c.EXECYEAR) AS "PrjType" ,FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S('', MULTIDEPTNAME) AS "PrjName" FROM COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP a JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_GROUP b ON a.DEPTCODE = b.GROUPCODE and b.GroupType='Dept' JOIN COVI_SMART4J.COLLAB_TEAM_EXEC c on b.groupid = c.groupid AND c.isClose='N' WHERE USERCODE = #{USERID} AND b.IsUse='Y' AND b.IsDisplay ='Y'

/* collab.report.getProjectReportWeekList */ SELECT sou.UserCode , sou.MultiDisplayName , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},sou.MultiDisplayName) as "UserName" , cr.ReportSeq , cr.WeekRemark, cr.NextPlan , cr.StartDate, cr.EndDate , cr.ReporterCode , cr.PrjType , cr.PrjSeq FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user sou
JOIN covi_smart4j.SYS_OBJECT_GROUP sb ON sb.GroupID = #{prjSeq} JOIN covi_smart4j.SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP soub ON sb.GroupCode = soub.DeptCode AND sou.UserCode = soub.UserCode
JOIN covi_smart4j.COLLAB_PROJECT cp on cp.PrjSeq = #{prjSeq} JOIN covi_smart4j.COLLAB_PROJECT_MEMBER cpm on cp.PrjSeq = cpm.PrjSeq and sou.UserCode = cpm.UserCode JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP soub ON soub.JobType='Origin' AND sou.UserCode = soub.UserCode
LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.COLLAB_REPORT cr ON sou.UserCode = cr.ReporterCode AND cr.PrjType = #{prjType} AND cr.PrjSeq= #{prjSeq} AND cr.StartDate = #{startDate} AND cr.EndDate = #{endDate} WHERE sou.IsUse = 'Y' AND sou.IsDisplay = 'Y' ORDER BY "UserName", soub.JobPositionSortKey
